Software Projects

Customers are unique. To fit individual needs, Merapar Technologies provides dedicated solutions, leveraging widely used and battle proven technologies. Merapar Technologies applies its agile philosophy, enabling early deployment, adding value fast and provide solutions which fit the exact customers’ needs.

Our mission

Merapar Technologies is to become the trusted software services company for European providers in media, telecom and technology, delivering high-end software services including consultancy, cloud-based solutions and development.

careers
